hero.headline: How to Create YouTube Playlists
hero.subheadline: Organize content, boost watch time, and improve channel navigation.

sections.content: Playlists organize your content and encourage binge-watching. When viewers watch multiple videos in a session, your watch time skyrockets. Playlists also rank in search and provide clear navigation for your channel.

faq.question: Do playlists rank in search?
faq.answer: Yes, playlists can appear in YouTube and Google search. Optimize titles and descriptions with keywords.

faq.question: Best number of videos per playlist?
faq.answer: 5-15 videos is a sweet spot. Enough to binge, not overwhelming. Very long playlists can be subdivided.

faq.question: Can I add other creators' videos?
faq.answer: Yes, you can create playlists with any public videos. Great for curating resources or collaborator collections.

faq.question: How to feature playlists on channel?
faq.answer: Customize channel layout in YouTube Studio. Add playlist sections to channel homepage. Highlight your best playlists.
